title: Patriot Coal gets court approval for reorganization plan
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
RICHMOND, V.A. Oct 8 (Reuters) - A U.S. bankruptcy court approved Patriot Coal's restructuring plan at a hearing on Thursday, including the ...
